title: IoT Developer / ThingsBoard Engineer (m/f/x)
description:
About Us

At AXO Track GmbH, we digitize existing railway infrastructure to make it safer, more efficient, and more sustainable. Using IoT-based predictive maintenance technologies, we develop solutions that monitor track systems in real time – enabling smarter rail operations and contributing to climate protection.
